Ubuntu California is a group of volunteers who advocate and promote Ubuntu and Free Software in California. We attend and plan events statewide, contact and work with LUGs and other local groups, and act as the public face of the Ubuntu community in California. The group is open to everybody in the state with an interest in spreading and discussing Ubuntu. 

=== Key Details ===

* '''Date''' - 2018 January 
* '''Leader''' - <nowiki>[[NathanHaines|Nathan Haines]]</nowiki>
* '''Launchpad''' - <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-california]]</nowiki>
* '''Mailing List''' - <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-ca|ubuntu-us-ca]]</nowiki> on lists.ubuntu.com (228 subscribed as of 2018 January 15)
* '''IRC''' - #ubuntu-us-ca on Freenode (<nowiki>[[CaliforniaTeam-Meetings|IRC meetings]]</nowiki> every other Sunday)
* '''Forums''' - <nowiki>[[https://ubuntuforums.org/forumdisplay.php?f=188]]</nowiki>
* '''Bi-Weekly Team Meetings''' - <nowiki>[[CaliforniaTeam-Meetings]]</nowiki>
* '''Microblogs''' - <nowiki>[[http://twitter.com/ubuntu_us_ca|Twitter]]</nowiki>
